body.name: MOZOTER Bluetooth 5.3 Wireless Earbuds,Deep Bass Loud Sound Clear Call Noise Cancelling with 4 Microphones in-Ear Headphones with Wireless Charging Case Compatible for iPhone Android,Workout
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 15 mins
features: 【Bluetooth 5.3 & One-Step Pairing】Featuring the most advanced Bluetooth 5.3 technology, MOZOTER Wireless Earbuds support HSP HFP A2DP AVRCP, which provides stable transmission speed and instant pairing without interruptions. These loud sound wireless earbuds will automatically turn on and enter pairing status when you open the charging case's lid, and you can pair the earbuds in Bluetooth settings of your phone.

【Hi-Fi Stereo Sound Quality& Clear Call】MOZOTER DBK02 bluetooth earphones offers a powerful heavy bass, ultra-clear vocals, and wonderful treble for using a 4-sound chamber design and 8mm speaker drivers. 2 built-in mics in each earbud utilize call noise cancellation to ensure clear and truly sound, allowing you to enjoy high quality conversations anytime, anywhere.

【Real-Time LED Power Display】The digital portion of the LED screen indicates the percentage of how much the real-time battery has left of the charging case. The smart LED digital screen can check battery consumption display anytime.Through this display, you are able to know the power of the earbuds at all times you can master the best time to charge it.

【Ultra Long Battery Life&Light Weight】Listen for up to 6 hours on a mono earbud,and pocket sized charging case that supplies recharges with type-c cable extends playtime up to extra 36 hours. Enjoy your favorite music with your wireless earphone on the go. With the ultra lightweight Craft,MOZOTER TWS Bluetooth earbuds offers a whole new wearing experiences,small size and lightweight make it burden-free on your ears.

【Comfortable & Secure Fit】Super comfort ergonomic design ensures secure fit and long-lasting comfort, 3 pairs of different sized soft rubber ear caps come for options (M size is installed). Perfect for your workout, sports,working,driving without easily falling out.Accommodate your ear canal without experiencing any discomfort while ensuring a secure fit. No more sore ears even after extended use. MOZOTER wireless earbuds strive to bring you the best wearing and listening experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MOZOTER Wireless earbuds with advanced bluetooth 5.3 technology produce stereo and deep bass loud sound with special LED power display.With three included sets of earcaps (S/M/L), you’ll get a custom, comfortable fit that won’t slip out easily. Large 8mm drivers with neodymium magnets along with a wide frequency response and smart ergonomic fit deliver dynamic, crystal clear sound while helping to keep out unwanted outside noise. Easy pairing makes it true wireless.

Powerful Bluetooth 5.3 chip earbuds that's compatible with Samsung galaxy S21/S22/S22Ultra,Notebook,Android,Windows,Motorola,oneplus,Google pixel,PC,MP3,MP4 and other Bluetooth enabled devices.Advanced Bluetooth 5.3 technology provides stable connection and high-speed transmission with lower power consumption, ensuring strong and long distance range.AI call noise cancelling technology ensures a more clear call.
Long lasting battery with LED power display.Enjoy fast charging with type-c charging cable and get total 36 hours of playing time in a single charge.

Excellent Sound Quality Supporting HSP,HFP,A2DP,AVRCP agreement, the unique stereo sound quality brings you a perfect deep bass sound, making you immerse in the real sound, reappearing every detail of the music vividly. Superior Crystal Clear Calls ENC Environmental Noise CancellingTechonlogy(Not ANC) reduce 90% of the ambient noises and enhance your voice during phone calls even in noisy environments.Accurately capture your voice in real-time, ideal for calls, face time, online meetings. Type-C Fast Charging Upgrade to the new way of charging with the Type-C connector. Just 15 minutes of charging time provides 1 hour of non-stop listening.And it only takes 1.5 hours to fully charge the charging case for longer battery life.

Compact design easily fits in your pocket and slight weight for carry.Wide compatible stereo headphones compatible for iPhone Android and other bluetooth enabled devices.Use each earbuds solo or both with a seamless connection.

Easy control to achieve core functions. Play/Pause: Tap once on either earbud Next Track: Press R earbud twice Previous Track: Press L earbud twiceVolume+: Long press R earbudVolume-: Long press L earbudVoice Assistant: Press L/R earbud three times

6 pairs of three different sizes of soft ear caps are available,ensure a comfortable wearing and secure fit. With the ergonomic design to attach into your ears seamlessly and brings extraordinary comfort fit that apart from others. PLEASE NOTE: ·Please remove the plastic film cover on the charging points of the earbuds and get them fully recharged before first use. ·Please try to reset your earbuds if the two earbuds cannot be paired with each other or your devices. ·The earbuds will not be disconnected and power off automatically when being put into the charging case if the case has no power.In this case, please charge the earbuds in time to ensure a better using experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality, great sounds, very comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: These headphones are such a great deal! They work well, sound great (even have bass) and are very comfortable. I love how long the batteries last and how the case can recharge the headphones quickly. I highly recommend these. Great value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little headphones!
reviews.reviewText: These Bluetooth headphones are bang for your buck! They fit anywhere, and I definitely can see using them for some time.They have a small case and different ears buds you can use. I did not have an issue with fit on these headphones. They are lightweight, so they stay in nicely. I even used them for a run - no slippage. I work on ladders, so that’s important.Waterproof? I’m not sure, they definitely are water resistant and held up to little spills or sweat.Sound? Sound is good. They are not bass heavy and don’t drown out the music. They block out sounds of the outside world very well. But, that could be a con to some.Button placement? I really don’t care for the fact the button is right on the side of headphones. It’s very easy to press when putting them in.Their warranty is bulletproof though, when I had an issue they promptly replaced! Be sure to activate it!Overall, 5 stars on these budget headphones!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pair fine for me, sound quality decent for price. No static.
reviews.reviewText: So far not terrible for $25. Both work at same time for me despite others having problems with both pairing at the same time. So far I haven't had any problems or delays with pairing them. Sound quality obviously isn't that good because they were only $25, but adequate enough. I can be pretty far away from my phone and they still work, and when I'm close to my phone I haven't had any problems with people hearing me over the earbuds. I have calls fine with no static, my voice is a little delayed for the other person. The button on the earbud pauses music by hitting it once, holding in the button ends a call, and hitting the button twice skips to the next song. The only problem I have with them is you cannot change the sound quality or bass, because I personally don't like bass, luckily there's not much bass but it would still be nice to change it up and down for people that like more bass or less bass. They don't automatically connect, i have to go back into my phone to reconnect them even thing though I have blue tooth on all the time. Container is small and sleek, they are comfortable in ears, shaped nice, not oddly shapped like others out there.Edit: It's been a few weeks and they've been good. I haven't had any issues yet like in the other reviews. I'm actually surprised they've been this good for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you buy these for such a low price, you WILL get what you pay for! 😡
reviews.reviewText: KUDOS for such an incredible value! First things first: These buds are stylish, comfortable, and deliver a bigger punch than I expected. The quality was unexpected with clear audio including bass that did NOT disappoint. In fact I was surprised it was as deep and smooth as it was from such a small form factor.Battery life was excellent and matched the time my phone.Call quality was good on my end but was excellent on the other end as well; a plus, considering that I usually have to switch my bluetooth off so the person I am speaking to can hear me.The fit is unintrusive and I had no issue whatsoever wearing these all day. With the large size cups, they stayed put all day as I worked outside.The case is small, stylish and fits nicely in a front pocket. I even forgot it was there! The power display is pleasant to look at and easy on the eyes; showing through a panel you otherwise wouldn't know was there. Love that it charges wirelessly.Overall, I can't see spending twice the money for what might be perceived as better bluetooth. Seriously, I can't see a negative and so far this has proved to be my BEST bluetooth purchase! And at such an incredible value, I'm definitely going to purchase a backup set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, long charge earbuds
reviews.reviewText: I have been using these to listen to audio from my phone for six months. It comes with a charging case that holds enough charge for around 24 hours of earbud use. The earbuds in use will go for 4-5 hours. Just drop them in the case for a recharge. You only need to plug the case when its charge is low. The display on the case is clear and shows how much charge remains.The set up was quick and simple and once connected by blue-tooth, all you do to use them is remove from the case and insert into ears. It comes with a variety of sleeves to fit different size ears.I am happy with the sound quality, and the range is about 30 feet before you lose connection to the device.

Buen producto. Sonido claro y con buen volumen. La entrega fue en el tiempo estipulado. La duración de la batería es bastante buena (por lo menos 4 horas) y se cargan con facilidad. Además las barras del display son de mucha ayuda.
